name: Autumn Bar
description:
Play the game loud or with headphones!

Autumn Bar is a videogame made with PICO-8 for the ESNE Game JamOn 2019.

It's a rhythm videogame where you play as a bartender who has to serve drinks to his clients.

Controls:

  • Up and Down arrows to move in the menu
  • Z  key to confirm and play notes

Credits:

  • Roberto Abad Jiménez: Code, Art and Music
